description:
Maintain a persistent history of all downloads with metadata (title, source platform, date, format). Include search/filter capabilities and one-click re-download of previous items without re-entering URLs.

**Rationale:** Users frequently need to re-download content or reference what they've previously saved. A searchable history prevents having to track URLs manually and enables quick access to previously downloaded content.
title: Download history with search and re-download
